pullrequest.title: More examples: install, create core library, find dependency, check pkg-config requires

content.raw:
You're right; I was able to confirm the warning occurs on the `ign-math4` windows build with `RelWithDebInfo`:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64&build=12)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64/12/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64/12/warnings42Result/

(I did need to use a special release-tools branch to set the build type properly: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/557/pass-build_type-to-configurebat/diff )
content.html:
You're right; I was able to confirm the warning occurs on the ign-math4 windows build with RelWithDebInfo:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64/12/warnings42Result/

(I did need to use a special release-tools branch to set the build type properly: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/557/pass-build_type-to-configurebat/diff )
